title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-host LLMs (Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma…) with one-line CLI or Docker; macOS/Linux/Windows.

title: ollama-python
summary: First-party Python client for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, list models.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client; Node & browser support, promises & streams.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain adapter to use Ollama models for chat, tools, embeddings, retrieval.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model manager, multi-user, dark mode).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; sync/async, fluent API, Android compatible.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI with syntax highlighting, chat history, config profiles.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models as GitHub Copilot replacement.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Template repo: FastAPI + Chroma + Ollama for document Q&A with citations.

title: ollama-node
summary: Lightweight npm wrapper around Ollama REST API with TypeScript definitions.

title: ollama-telegram
summary: Telegram bot that chats with local Ollama models; group & private chats, per-user quotas.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama generators & embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama service in CI for testing LLM-powered features.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama with async enumerable streaming and dependency injection helpers.
